english.segment1: I look through photographs and faded letters from you. an empty shoebox on my bed. lingering thoughts of what you said. falling away from me
english.segment2: they say that where I've been is not who I am. and where I am does not define where I'm going. someday I'll find this place
english.segment3: I've dreamed up things that I just can't let go. [dreamed up things I can't let go.]. [Conform in me your perfect will.]
english.segment4: and sometimes I hide, but you always find me. and sometimes I run, but you're always beside me. I feel you beside me, never behind me. I feel you beside me today
english.segment5: this is my prayer, Lord that I'll find your will my ife is in your hands draw your plans. use my hands
english.segment6: I've dreamed up things that I just can't let go. don't let me be this way - no. I don't want things my way. my delight is in you, my Holy Lord. conform me to your will. Lord, do with me what you will
english.segment7: all these photographs and faded letters from you. an empty shoebox on my bed. lingering thoughts of what you said. show me a better me.
